title: lol authentication
body: lol authentication take so long     i clicked play so laggggggggggggggggggggggggg what happen?  my friends  are fine

replies.body: Are you getting through at all?  Your connection could have some hiccups trying to reach our authentication servers, so our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide might help out with this.  Let me know if you have any questions.
Having this issue as well, submitted ticket hours ago.

I looked into this and see that a specialist has responded to your ticket.  There's a few steps involved here but it will help make sure all possibilities are ruled out.  Hit him up in your ticket if you have any questions or concerns!
